org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable.block

Interface Block

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LA32Block, LBlock, LTA32Block, LTBlock

    public interface Block
    A wrapper for a Root to be read from or written to disk. The header added to the serialized data contains the length of the serialized data and, optionally, a timestamp and checksum.
